Procs

proc convert(file: string; fromType: Option[FileType]; to: FileType;
             options: Option[ConvertOptions]): ConvertResult {....raises: [
    MissingTypeException, ValueError, IOError, ParseError, KeyError, OSError,
    PreserveFileException, ConvertException, Exception,
    MissingConversionException, JsonParsingError, JsonKindError,
    InvalidModeException, InvalidTypeException],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Converts the provided file to the requested output-format (to). If the fromType is not provided, it'll attempt to detect it from the file via the detectFileType func. If no options are provided, it'll get the default options for the output-type (to) via the getDefaultOptions func.   Source   Edit
